module.name: User Control Panel
module.description: Formerly ARI, now called User Control Panel
module.changelog: *12.0.0beta13* Expire all user sessions on upgrade (which forces a logout from now on) *12.0.0beta12* Logout user is poller is forbidden, small visual tweaks *12.0.0beta11* Scroll Bar removal if not needed. *12.0.0beta10* Visual consistencies between firefox and chrome *12.0.0beta9* Call the hook using username instead of userid *12.0.0beta8* Standardization in presence menu items *12.0.0beta7* Added the hooks required for Webrtc type modules *12.0.0beta6* Allow multiple options per module *12.0.0beta5* Show settings on user creation *12.0.0beta4* Many enhancements to the visuals, moved presence states, etc *12.0.0beta3* Dont die when a module or UCP is disabled in FreePBX *12.0.0beta2* Regression from 2.11 *12.0.0beta1* Bump to Beta *12.0.0alpha8* Remove some dev work *12.0.0alpha7* Several Additions and features (yes again) also bump version requirements *12.0.0alpha6* Several Additions and Features, see commit log *12.0.0alpha5* Now using usermanager *12.0.0alpha2* Stage 1 Completed. Completely modular and object orientated *12.0.0alpha1* Lets get some structure in there and figure this all out
